message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $100 is a bit too low for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
